\section{restServer}
\label{\detokenize{modules:restserver}}\index{restHttpServer (class in restServer)@\spxentry{restHttpServer}\spxextra{class in restServer}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{modules:restServer.restHttpServer}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{class }}\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{restServer.}}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{restHttpServer}}}{\emph{cliArgsDict}}{}~\begin{description}
\item[{asyncio rest server for incoming logging messages from the RtBrick System append}] \leavevmode
stores the json text in redis.

\end{description}
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Parameters}] \leavevmode\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{cliArgsDict}}\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{{[}}}\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{"configFile"}}\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{{]}}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{str}}) \textendash{} defines the configfile which is used to load the configDict via function loadBdsSnmpAdapterConfigFile

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{configDict}}\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{{[}}}\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{"listeningIP"}}\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{{]}}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{str}}) \textendash{} defines the IPv4 address on which the server listens. use 0.0.0.0 for all interfaces.

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{configDict}}\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{{[}}}\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{"listeningPort"}}\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{{]}}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{int}}) \textendash{} defines the TCP Port address on which the server listens.

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{configDict}}\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{{[}}}\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{"redisServerIp"}}\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{{]}}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{str}}) \textendash{} defines the IPv4 address on which the redis server listens.

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{configDict}}\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{{[}}}\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{"redisServerPort"}}\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{{]}}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{int}}) \textendash{} defines the TCP Port address on which the redis server listens.

\end{itemize}

\end{description}\end{quote}

\index{handler() (restServer.restHttpServer method)@\spxentry{handler()}\spxextra{restServer.restHttpServer method}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{modules:restServer.restHttpServer.handler}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{handler}}}{\emph{request}}{}~
\begin{DUlineblock}{0em}
\item[] Coroutine that accepts a Request instance as its only argument.
\item[] Stores the json body as string in redis key rtbrickLogging-\textless{}client-ip\textgreater{}-\textless{}request\#\textgreater{}. \#\#\#FIXME overrun int
\item[] Returnes 200 with a copy of the incoming header dict.
\end{DUlineblock}

\end{fulllineitems}

\index{run\_forever() (restServer.restHttpServer method)@\spxentry{run\_forever()}\spxextra{restServer.restHttpServer method}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{modules:restServer.restHttpServer.run_forever}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{run\_forever}}}{}{}~
\begin{DUlineblock}{0em}
\item[] starts the aiohttp Web Server
\item[] runs then in an infinite loop which stores every second a status K/V dataset in redis
\end{DUlineblock}

\end{fulllineitems}


\end{fulllineitems}
